Architect Life: A House Design Simulator puts players in control of designing and building dream homes, offering a blend of creative tools and detailed customization. The game provides an immersive architectural experience, allowing users to manage projects from concept to completion.

Gameplay and Visuals

Players can shape every aspect of their houses, from the layout of bedrooms to the design of roofs and balconies. The visual style includes modern homes and detailed environments, featuring features
title: Architect Life: House Design Simulator Launches on Consoles and PC

Undead Citadel, developed by Dark Curry S.L., is set to release for PS VR2 on June 26, bringing intense undead battles and immersive VR combat features to the platform.

Gameplay and Visuals

Players will confront grotesque undead creatures with glowing blue eyes in a dark, abandoned setting. Combat is physics-based, prioritizing 1:1 movement for realistic slashing, stabbing, and crushing. The game includes over 60 hand-to-hand weapons, such as swords, axes, war hammers, maces, shields, and two-handed options. Ranged co
title: Undead Citadel Announces PS VR2 Release Date and Features

ARK: Ragnarok Ascended brings a fully rebuilt, expansive 144km² map to ARK: Survival Ascended, offering players new biomes, creatures, and secrets to discover. The release introduces an updated landscape inspired by Norse mythology, combining classic and new areas for exploration and survival.

Gameplay and Visuals

The map features a variety of environments, including molten volcanoes, icy peaks, lush forests, and underwater labyrinths. Players can traverse golden open plains, dense redwoods, and sun-bleached deserts. Th
title: ARK: Ragnarok Ascended Map Launches with New Biomes and Creatures

title: Is PvP Optional? Full Loot & Zones Guide – Dune: Awakening

Rogue Loops is a roguelite action game where players guide a trapped family through an endless, challenging loop, working to break free by defeating powerful guardians. The game features unique skill and relic combinations, strategic decision-making, and a risk-reward system that evolves with each attempt.

Gameplay and Visuals

The game showcases intense action sequences as characters wield glowing blue swords against formidable bosses. Each attempt allows players to combine a variety of skills and relics, creating powerful synergies to
title: Rogue Loops Gameplay, Characters, and Release Date Revealed
